citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:15 pm on
10-Apr-19. The licensee was contacted by phone after arriving at the facility. The license indicated he was not at
the facility and unavailable for inspection.
A responsible person shall be available to conduct an inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:15 pm  on
10-Apr-19.  The licensee was contacted by phone after arriving at the facility.  The license indicated he was not at
the facility and unavailable for inspection.
A responsible person shall be available to conduct an inspection.
